xxl.io
Class IOCounter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--xxl.io.IOCounter
public class IOCounter
extends Object

This class provides a simple utility for counting I/Os. It contains two counters for read and write operations and a sole method to reset the counters.

Field Summary
 int readIO
          A counter for read operations.
 int writeIO
          A counter for write operations.
 
Constructor Summary
IOCounter()
          Constructs a new IOCounter.
 
Method Summary

          Resets the counters for read and write operations.

Field Detail

Constructor Detail

IOCounter

public IOCounter()
Constructs a new IOCounter.
Method Detail

reset

public void reset()
Resets the counters for read and write operations. In other words the counters readIO and writeIO will be equal to 0 after a call to this method.
